translation.MainDesc: I make dreams come true by coding
translation.AboutTxt: Hi, iÂ´m Roberto, nice to meet you
translation.AboutTxt2: I'm 17 years old and I'm fascinated by the technology market, the power that programming has to create and solve people's problems in everyday life is what made me fall in love with this area. I do some freelance work in order to help grow companies and my knowledge.
translation.CardDesc1: I'm no expert in design, but I know my way around most of the time, I took a graphic design course and I have a good understanding of the subject.
translation.CardDesc2: My favorite part of being a dev, I like to develop something that everyone can see and interact with.
translation.CardDesc3: Although I prefer the front, I have some knowledge in the back as well to be a complete dev and build complete applications.
translation.InterestedTxt: I am always open to new job opportunities and partnerships.
translation.StartNewProjectTxt: Interested in working together? We must start to talk, I got the coffee.
translation.MyRecentWorkTxt: Here's some of my projects I've worked on recently. Want to see more?
translation.ContactTxt: Complete the fields on the side to get in touch!
translation.ContactTxt2: I will reply as soon as possible.
